mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (content, code, reply_no, pay_no, qna_no, user_no) VALUES (#{content}, #{code}, #{replyNo}, #{payNo}, #{qnaNo}, #{userNo})
mapper.select: SELECT m.*,u.name FROM message m join user u ON u.user_no = m.user_no WHERE m.user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE message SET content = #{content}, code = #{code}, reply_no = #{replyNo}, pay_no = #{payNo}, qna_no = #{qnaNo}, user_no = #{userNo} WHERE message_no = #{messageNo}
mapper.select: WITH RankedMessages AS ( SELECT m.*, u.name, SUM(CASE WHEN m.code = 'toAdmin' THEN m.view ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY m.user_no) AS count, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY m.user_no ORDER BY m.message_no DESC) AS rn FROM message m JOIN user u ON u.user_no = m.user_no ) SELECT * FROM RankedMessages WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY view DESC, message_no DESC;
